get.summary: BlockGasTracking returns block gas tracking for the current block

txs.description: txs defines the list of transactions tracked in the block.

archway.tracking.v1beta1.BlockTracking.description: BlockTracking is the tracking information for a block.

archway.tracking.v1beta1.ContractOperati.description: ContractOperation denotes which operation consumed gas.

id.description: id defines the unique operation ID.

tx_id.description: tx_id defines a transaction ID operation relates to (TxInfo.id).

contract_address.description: contract_address defines the contract address operation relates to.

operation_type.description: operation_type defines the gas consumption type.

vm_gas.description:
vm_gas is the gas consumption reported by the WASM VM.
Value is adjusted by this module (CalculateUpdatedGas func).

sdk_gas.description:
sdk_gas is the gas consumption reported by the SDK gas meter and the WASM GasRegister (cost of Execute/Query/etc).
Value is adjusted by this module (CalculateUpdatedGas func).

archway.tracking.v1beta1.ContractOperati.description:
ContractOperationInfo keeps a single contract operation gas consumption data.
Object is being created by the IngestGasRecord call from the wasmd.

archway.tracking.v1beta1.QueryBlockGasTr.description: QueryBlockGasTrackingResponse is the response for Query.BlockGasTracking.

id.description: id defines the unique transaction ID.

height.description: height defines the block height of the transaction.

total_gas.description:
total_gas defines total gas consumption by the transaction.
It is the sum of gas consumed by all contract operations (VM + SDK gas).

archway.tracking.v1beta1.TxInfo.description:
TxInfo keeps a transaction gas tracking data.
Object is being created at the module EndBlocker.

contract_operations.description: contract_operations defines the list of contract operations consumed by the transaction.

archway.tracking.v1beta1.TxTracking.description: TxTracking is the tracking information for a single transaction.
